entry.title: Action of the automorphism group on the Jacobian of Klein's quartic curve II: Invariant theta-functions
entry.summary: In our previous paper we determined the singularities of the quotient variety of the 3-dimensional Jacobian of the plane Klein quartic curve by its full automorphism group of order 336. We showed that the singularities are the same as those of the 3-dimensional weighted projective space (WPS) with weights 1,2,4,7, which prompted us to conjecture that the quotient is eventually isomorphic to this WPS. We are now providing another piece of evidence in favor of this conjecture, computing the Hilbert function of the algebra of invariant theta-functions on the Jacobian. We show that it coincides with the Hilbert function of the second Veronese algebra of the WPS and provide conjectural generators of the invariant algebra.
